@HeWhoOpensADoor wrote:

umm…I have the same problem as billytal person, i go into client.java, control+F then search for Moderators, i get to that page, then i cahnge the name of the top one called “Admin” to “34534” playerRights =3 so i can be an admin…and i compile…says something about API depreciation and -xlint something something and i log on and theres no changes what so ever…its really starting to tick me off as i have been trying to make my self an admin for like…the past 2 hours…lol yeah i know…pathetic eh?..but yeah, any help would be appreciated oh and my server source is Testscape…

item.description:
@Valid wrote:

well in char files find your user if not there make them or you log out, and it should appear double click and make sure they logged out and find player rights and change the 0 to a 1 - mod 2 - admin - 3 - owner/co-owner make sure they logged off and save it get them to log on and say sumthing. Hope it worked

item.title: Can someone help me to make admins i do what they,,,,
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“billytal47”]hi i need to make myself an admin on my server and others but cant what do i do go to client find admin list where exactly do i put the name where in this area

(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}[/quote]

Search for:

playerRights = 3;

Next look above and find this:

(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("

Within the " _ " edit it to your username.
Save and compile.
Run Server and see what’sup.

Read full topic
